===================
HYVR Example
===================

An example of a parameter file mimicking the MADE site in Columbus, Mississippi, is included in this section.

.. _MADE:
.. figure:: img/MADEsmall_lowres.jpg
	:align: 	center
	:width:		75%
	
	*Examply field mimicking the MADE site, generated using HyVR.*
